ModMetaData.name: CutePenguin (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: totobrother, Mehni
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of totobrother and Mehnis mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1264959770
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/CutePenguin][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] Add new cute animal [Penguin] for game. This penguins are modified gene by Mehni. So They have incredible intelligence! They can haul your items and clean your base! Don't treat them harsh. They are useful!
Code : Mehni XML : totobrother Art : totobrother Preview image : Allet
Reuploading this because people asked me for a B18 release and I had it.
More information and "A Dog said Compatible Patch" is here. - https://totobrothers.blogspot.kr/2017/11/cute-penguin-cutest-penguin-in-rimworld.html
If you enjoy this? Then try totobrother's other mods! Realistic Farming : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1136426568 Various Ship chunks : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1158568885
If you want to buy totobrother some coke. https://www.patreon.com/bePatron?c=1303650 -- here and give 1$ !! It helps making mod a lot !!
